feed.title: Rocky Mountain House - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
